it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.util.Observable
    Is the model of the game, it contains all the information of the state of one single game
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio, Matteo Pagliari

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Model(int numberOfPlayers, java.lang.String mapName)
      Constructor of the Model, it calls the static methods createMap and createPlaayer

      adds an event to the list, notifies the observers (in our case the broker) in order to broadcast the message to all the players
      void addEvent(java.lang.String event)
      Overloaded method to support our first implementation of the controller It is called only when an event in the game happens so we create a new Event Message of type game_event to notify through the above method

    • Method Detail

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer()
        Sets the current player to the next player who is waiting to start his turn. When the round is completed we increment the round number so the controller can check that the game has not run for more than 39 rounds.

      • getPendingPlayers

        public java.util.Set<Player> getPendingPlayers()
        Creates a set of players that have not yet been assigned to a client. I.E. without an UUID from a user
        Returns:
        the set of players without ad UUID

      • getPlayerById

        public java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,Player> getPlayerById()
        Returns:
        the map that associates each player to its assigned UUID of the client

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(EventMessage event)
        adds an event to the list, notifies the observers (in our case the broker) in order to broadcast the message to all the players
        Parameters:
        event - the EventMessage to share

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(java.lang.String event)
        Overloaded method to support our first implementation of the controller It is called only when an event in the game happens so we create a new Event Message of type game_event to notify through the above method
        Parameters:
        event - the string to put into the new EventMessage
